title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in India 2024
yAxis: GDP growth rate compared to previous year
summary: Overall GDP growth rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and finally roughly constant from 2020 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
Maximum GDP growth rate compared to previous year, about 7.44 was reported at Year 2021,  2022, and 2023
The lowest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 6.12 was reported at Year 2019
